articles.title: Syrian Party on 55th Anniversary of DPRK
S. Korean Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Syrian Party on 55th Anniversary of DPRK 
    Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria made public a statement on Aug. 12 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 The Political Bureau praises with great pride the DPRK for keeping victorious advance in the struggle to achieve national reunification and build a great prosperous powerful nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, said the statement.    
 The statement extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Il and the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people on the 55th anniversary of the DPRK and wished the DPRK only success.

Paek Nam Sun Greets Indonesian Foreign Minister
Greetings to Gabonese President
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Greets Indonesian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Indonesian Foreign Minister Nur Hassan Wirayuda on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the Indonesian independence.
 The message expressed the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop in the future, too.

articles.title: Greetings to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Gabonese President
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to El Hadj Omar Bongo, president of Gabon, on August 14 on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of independence of Gabon.
 Wishing the president and people of Gabon successes in their work for peace and prosperity of the country, the message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: High-level Military Delegation of China to Visit DPRK
articles.content:
Greetings to Indonesian President
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Indonesian President Megawati Soekarnoputri on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the independence of Indonesia.
 The message expressed the conviction that the favorably developing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in different fields and wished the president greater success in her work and the Indonesian people stability, prosperity and welfare.

High-level Military Delegation of China to Visit DPRK
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A high-level military delegation of the Chinese People's Liberation Army will soon visit the DPRK. The delegation will be led by Colonel General Xu Caihou, director of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who is member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and member of its Central Military Commission
